data.description: Optional, defaults to false. Whether to include swap statuses in response
A list of currently active swap UUIDs
Only visible if include_status=true. Map of SwapStatus objects by UUID (see /komodo-defi-framework/api/common_structures/swaps/#swap-status)
Return only swaps that match the swap.my_coin = request.my_coin condition
Return only swaps that match the swap.other_coin = request.other_coin condition
Return only swaps that match the swap.started_at >= request.from_timestamp condition
Return only swaps that match the swap.started_at < request.to_timestamp condition
UUIDs of swaps that match the selected filters
my_coin that was set in the request; null if not provided
other_coin that was set in the request; null if not provided
from_timestamp that was set in the request; null if not provided
to_timestamp that was set in the request; null if not provided
Number of UUIDs that match the selected filters
